input_csv.title: Gene Ranking Table
input_csv.description: Table of gene enrichment (typically from differential expression analysis) containing association scores and p-values.

gene_column.title: Gene ID Column Name
gene_column.description: Header of the column containing gene IDs.
gene_column.help_text: This value should not need to be modified when processing outputs of the Differential Expression analysis tool.

score_column.title: Gene Score Column Name
score_column.description: Header of the column containing gene scores (e.g., log fold change for differential expression).
score_column.help_text: This value should not need to be modified when processing outputs of the Differential Expression analysis tool.

pval_column.title: P-value Column Name
pval_column.description: Header of the column containing gene p-values.
pval_column.help_text: This value should not need to be modified when processing outputs of the Differential Expression analysis tool.
